source.name: Tokenization Benefits and Misconceptions
source.instructions: Consider the following statements about asset tokenization on blockchain. Select all that are accurate:

answers.answer: Tokenization can enable 24/7 trading of assets, potentially increasing market liquidity
Smart contracts associated with tokenized assets eliminate all risks of fraud
Tokenization can reduce geographical barriers to investment by allowing global participation
All tokenized assets are guaranteed to have high trading volumes
Tokenization can enable fractional ownership of traditionally illiquid assets

source.guidance: The correct options highlight key benefits of tokenization: 24/7 trading increasing liquidity, reduced geographical barriers, and enabling fractional ownership. These accurately reflect the potential of blockchain-based asset tokenization to transform markets. The incorrect options address common misconceptions: while smart contracts can enhance security, they don't eliminate all fraud risks, and tokenization doesn't guarantee high trading volumes for all assets. This question tests understanding of both the advantages and limitations of tokenization, encouraging critical thinking about its real-world applications.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT evaluate the benefits and limitations of asset tokenization on blockchain
